short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Launcher for OneUp TV, part of the OneUp Sales platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make sales fun with lively leaderboards, real-time deal celebrations and competitions for modern sales teams!

Our OneUp TV Chrome Extension enables you to launch OneUp TV with minimal fuss so you can focus on producing results instead of tinkering with TVs.

Please note: the use of this extension requires a OneUp Sales account. Visit www.oneupsales.co.uk to get started.
